main event: A witness in Leetonia, Ohio reported seeing three bright, metallic-appearing objects in the sky that were hovering and then suddenly accelerated and disappeared on May 11, 1966.
interesting points: The objects were described as being the size of the moon, very bright but not as bright as the stars.
The objects sometimes appeared to be moving straight, and sometimes slightly southward.
The witness, Mrs. Dotty Hassell, stated she had never seen anything like this before and was quite shaken by the experience.
The Air Force investigator noted they were not aware of any other similar reports from the Leetonia area on that date.
The Air Force requested the witness complete an FTD Form 164 to provide more information, but it was not returned within 30 days.
